trainings.title: Hurricane Preparedness
trainings.notes: Self-paced Online Learning (30 Minutes). Required States: AL, CT, DC, DE, FL, GA, HI, LA, MA, MD, ME, MS, NC, NH, NJ, NY, PA, RI, SC, TX, VA within 100 miles of the coastline; required for entire state of Florida & Hawaii. In MLAC - All Caribbean hotels & hotels within 161 km (100 miles) of the Gulf of Mexico Coastlines. In Central America - Honduras is required.
